title: 3 Meter Door and Window Seal Strip ? Adhesive Weather Stripping ? Soundproof, Dustproof & Energy Saving
description:
3 Meter Door and Window Seal Strip ? Adhesive Weather Stripping ? Soundproof, Dustproof & Energy Saving
Keep your home clean, quiet, and energy-efficient with this 5-meter Door and Window Seal Strip. Made with high-quality transparent silicone, this strip features strong 3M adhesive for secure, long-lasting installation. It effectively blocks dust, insects, cold air, noise, and water, making it ideal for doors, windows, and sliding panels. Easy to install and cut to size, it?s the perfect solution for year-round weatherproofing.

Key Features:
3 Meter Roll ? Long enough to seal multiple doors or windowsMulti-Protection ? Blocks dust, insects, wind, water, and noiseEnergy Saving ? Keeps cold air out and traps heat inside, reducing energy billsPremium Quality Silicone ? Flexible, durable, and weather-resistantStrong Adhesive ? Ensures firm, long-lasting grip without leaving residueEasy Installation ? Cut to size and stick; no tools required
Uses:
Door gaps and window framesSliding doors and shower glassSoundproofing roomsPreventing cold drafts in winter or heat loss in summer
Package Includes:
1 x 3 Meter Door and Window Seal Strip with 3M adhesive
